title: Business Analytics Performance Management Pre Sales Engineer - Bay Area - USA-CA-San Francisco
text:
Business Analytics Performance Management Pre Sales Engineer - Bay AreaJob ID S_D-0798203 Job type Full-time RegularWork country USA Position type ProfessionalWork city Bakersfield,CA, Foster City,CA, San Francisco,CA, San Jose,CA, San Ramon,CA Posted 25-Sep-2015Travel 25% travel annually Job area SalesBusiness group IBM Sales & Distribution Job category SalesBusiness unit AnalyticSWSales Job role Client Technical Specialist Job role skillset BA.Business Intelligence-ADDCommissionable/Sales-Incentive jobs only YesJob descriptionIBM is seeking talent to join our Business Analytics presales team in the Western Region, primarily focused on Performance Management (PM) solution sales. As part of our elite Business Analytics team, you will leverage business process knowledge and provide technical support to help move sales opportunities to closure. Responsibilities may include demos, proof of concept, creating responses to request for information/proposals, participation in marketing events, provide skills transfer, develop and deliver intellectual capital and provide input in product and sales strategy.Successful Performance Management Solution Specialist candidates should have experience in a Finance environment working with Budgeting and Planning systems such as IBM Cognos, TM1 (preferred), IBM Cognos Planning, Hyperion Planning, SAP Business Planning & Consolidation (BPC), Clarity etc. They should have an understanding of competitive technologies and their place in the market, and be able to present to audiences of all levels within a business. They should also have knowledge of the Budgeting and Planning space, understand the issues/pains that finance users experience with legacy budgeting and planning solutions such as Excel and be able to articulate a corresponding solution based on IBM software. Knowledge of competitive landscape is also crucial.Required * At least 2 years experience in finance environment working with enterprise Financial Reporting and Budgeting systems * Readiness to travel 25% travel annually * English: Fluent* Bachelor's Degree * At least 2 years experience in financial budgeting, planning and forecasting * At least 2 years experience in complex spreadsheet modeling and the ability to transfer this to software solutions * At least 5 years experience in finance environment working with enterprise Financial Reporting and Budgeting systems * At least 2 years experience in technical presales and consulting * At least 2 years experience in IBM Cognos TM1, IBM Cognos Planning, Hyperion Planning, SAP BPC, Hyperion HFM, Essbase, Clarity or similar products * Basic knowledge in SEC and Edgar reporting requirements * Basic knowledge in understanding prospects business requirements * At least 2 years experience in accounting with a general understanding of business processes IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status. IBM will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance. Company info International Business Machines Corp. ( IBM Corporation ) Website : http://www.ibm.com/ 
Company Profile IBM believes that a company culture based on core values not only helps our business, but also defines the role that we can and should play in society. We identify and act upon new opportunities to apply our technology and expertise to societal problems. We scale our existing programs and initiatives to achieve maximum benefit. We empower our employees and others to serve their communities. We integrate corporate citizenship and social responsibility into every aspect of our company. Employer job
